response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value and potential for you. This product has been meticulously crafted to cater to your specific needs and expectations. Considering its quality, functionality, and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing you with exceptional returns on your investment. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 850000}
